root.name: Adventure Collection: Volume One
root.description: This collection of 5 adventure games includes:Dead ReefsKeepsakeNibiru: Age of SecretsReturn to Mysterious IslandThe Secret Files: TunguskaPC System RequirementsWindows 2000/XPPentium 3 800MHz Processor64MB RAMDirectX 964MB DirectX 9 Compliant Video CardDirectX 9 Compatible Sound Card2X DVD-ROM Drive
